Name: Riding Horse School
About the game: It's time to make new friends! Riding Horse School is a simulator that teaches you how to ride properly and behave with a horse. Your mission is to analyze all these rules and choose a horse that will be your companion in the competitions you will participate in together. You will need proper clothing for this type of sport because you may have trouble if you are not properly prepared. This animal feels the man very well, that's why to get beautiful results you need a connection between you 2. Try, learn, practice. That's the only way you'll be successful! Game Features: - 10 horse breeds - 10 types of skins(5 girls/5 boys) - 20 levels
